metadata.title: CVE-2014-3004 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The default configuration for the Xerces SAX Parser in Castor before 1.3.3allows context-dependent attackers to conduct XML External Entity (XXE)attacks via a crafted XML document.

criterions.comment: castor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
